SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.mapper

Interface FinishedCourseMapper

public interface FinishedCourseMapper
MapStruct mapper interface for converting between FinishedCourseEntity and FinishedCourseDTO.

Features:

  • Automatic mapping between entity and DTO, including nested user and course fields
  • Handles mapping of collections (List and Set) of finished courses and DTOs
  • Ignores null values for PATCH updates (partial updates)
  • Prevents circular references by ignoring user field in inverse mapping

Usage: This interface is implemented automatically by MapStruct at build time. Inject or obtain an instance via CDI or the generated implementation for use in your service layer.

  • Method Details

    • toDto

      FinishedCourseDTO toDto(FinishedCourseEntity finishedCourseEntity)
      Maps a FinishedCourseEntity to a FinishedCourseDTO.

      Maps nested user and course fields to flat DTO fields for API use.

      Parameters:
      finishedCourseEntity - the entity to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped DTO, or null if input is null

    • courseAreaToString

      default String courseAreaToString(CourseArea area)
      Helper to map CourseArea enum to its fieldName (lowercase string) for DTO.

    • toDtoList

      List<FinishedCourseDTO> toDtoList(List<FinishedCourseEntity> finishedCourses)
      Maps a list of FinishedCourseEntity objects to a list of FinishedCourseDTO objects.
      Parameters:
      finishedCourses - the list of entities to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped list of DTOs (empty if input is empty or null)

    • toDtoSet

      Set<FinishedCourseDTO> toDtoSet(Set<FinishedCourseEntity> finishedCourses)
      Maps a set of FinishedCourseEntity objects to a set of FinishedCourseDTO objects.
      Parameters:
      finishedCourses - the set of entities to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped set of DTOs (empty if input is empty or null)

    • toEntity

      FinishedCourseEntity toEntity(FinishedCourseDTO finishedCourseDTO)
      Maps a FinishedCourseDTO back to a FinishedCourseEntity.

      Ignores mapping of the user field to prevent infinite recursion; set user in the service layer if needed.

      Parameters:
      finishedCourseDTO - the DTO to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped entity, or null if input is null

    • updateFinishedCourseFromDto

      void updateFinishedCourseFromDto(FinishedCourseDTO dto, FinishedCourseEntity entity)
      Updates an existing FinishedCourseEntity with non-null values from a FinishedCourseDTO.

      Useful for PATCH updates where only specific fields should be modified. Ignores the ID field to prevent accidental changes.

      Parameters:
      dto - the DTO containing updated fields
      entity - the entity to update (modified in place)
